text: 3.9: Ais 30.18; Hab 2.3; Ro 2.4; 1 T 2.4; Hi 10.37; 1 Pi 3.20Gumgi mbari khaŋ nzuai, Guma Bakɨme wo suaŋgi bigi, ana mbarara nta mbui. Gumgi mbari maaŋ nzuai. Zakɨra fhuvara! Guma Bakɨme ana wo suaŋgi bigi, ana mbarara nta mbui fhuvara. Ana guma the fhɨrgirɨgɨp ŋgu mbatɨgar ŋgɨrgane thagi. Ana khueŋ vuzvugi, kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi za ndavi dorgɨrga. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbarara nde mbuav, nden rarga khar ki.
